channel.title: Short on A Blog for Ben
channel.description: Recent content in Short on A Blog for Ben

item.title: Shower Thought
item.description: I’m working on my new creative project and reminding myself how to use Next.js (I haven’t touched it since before my last job). This is a cool framework. I’m not sure if they’ve just sold me on snake oil but if it works how it should, I’m really excited to use it and talk about it here!
